name: Firepit And Grill

pages.name: A Firepit with Grill
pages.text: The grill is a way of cooking foods more efficiently.

The grill is smithed from a $(thing)Wrought Iron Double Sheet$(). It has 5 slots, each of which can be used for cooking. Food cooked in a grill has the $(thing)wood grilled$() trait, which makes it last longer.
